snippet.title: Eldevin Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
On Steam now! http://store.steampowered.com/app/298160/

An exciting Free-To-Play MMORPG!

Originally browser-based, now with a dedicated desktop client. 

http://www.eldevin.com/

* Features a rich storyline with over a thousand quests
* Huge world to explore with many realms, dungeons and secrets.
* Class-less Combat System; learn any of over 100 unique abilities.
* Train 14 professions, & craft your own weapons, armor and gems.
* Group based dungeons with a looking for group queue system.
* Open World PvP Wilderness.
* Legendary creatures to find and defeat!

Find us on Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/eldevin
Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/eldevin

Game Forum - http://forums.huntedcow.com/eldevin

Thank you for supporting our games!

© 2013 Hunted Cow Studios Ltd
